title: Rent to Own in Royal Oak. 2 Beds, 1 Baths
posting_body: 1080 SF on 2 stories with an additional 540 SF of Basement.
Hardwood floors throughout, freshly painted and remodeled bathroom in 2013.
Nice location not far from downtown Royal Oak.
This is a must see, Lots of space for a great price!
